SEARCH
Package org.marjoriekohn.diningreview.repository

Interface ReviewRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Review,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Review,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Review,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Review,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Review,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Review>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Review,Long>
@Repository public interface ReviewRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Review,Long>
Manages database interactions for Review entities. The ReviewRepository interface is a Spring Data JPA repository that provides a set of methods for performing database operations on Review entities. It supports fetching reviews based on various criteria such as approval status, associated restaurant, or a combination of both. This interface is crucial for filtering and managing reviews in the system.
See Also:

  • ReviewService
  • ReviewController

  • Method Details

    • findByStatus

      List<Review> findByStatus(Review.Status status)
      Fetches reviews based on approval status. This method retrieves a list of Review entities that match a given approval status from the database. The list may be empty if no reviews with the specified status are found.
      Parameters:
      status - the approval status for filtering reviews, required
      Returns:
      a list of Review entities that have the specified approval status
      See Also:
      • Review.Status

    • findByRestaurantAndStatus

      List<Review> findByRestaurantAndStatus(Restaurant restaurant, Review.Status status)
      Fetches reviews for a specific restaurant with a given approval status. This method retrieves a list of Review entities associated with a particular restaurant and having a specific approval status. The list may be empty if no reviews with the specified criteria are found.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - the Restaurant entity for filtering reviews, required
      status - the approval status for filtering reviews, required
      Returns:
      a list of Review entities meeting the specified criteria
      See Also:
      • Restaurant
      • Review.Status

    • findByUserAndRestaurant

      List<Review> findByUserAndRestaurant(User user, Restaurant restaurant)
      Retrieves reviews submitted by a specific user for a particular restaurant. This method fetches a list of Review entities from the database that were submitted by a given user for a specific restaurant. The list may be empty if no matching reviews are found.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity who submitted the reviews, required
      restaurant - the Restaurant entity for which the reviews were submitted, required
      Returns:
      a list of Review entities that meet the given criteria
      See Also:
      • User
      • Restaurant
